name: ToolOrchestra (NVlabs)
description: [项目级] ToolOrchestra is an end-to-end RL training framework for orchestrating tools and agentic workflows.。来源: https://github.com/NVlabs/ToolOrchestra

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
ToolOrchestra is an end-to-end RL training framework for orchestrating tools and agentic workflows.

来源: https://github.com/NVlabs/ToolOrchestra
语言: Python
Stars: 651

name: ToolOrchestra/evaluation 模块
description: [模块级] ToolOrchestra 项目的 evaluation 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/NVlabs/ToolOrchestra

genes.title: evaluation 模块说明
genes.content:
You need to re-build the image because it requires local installation of tau2:

```bash
srun --partition=interactive --time=04:00:00 --nodes=1 --overcommit --ntasks-per-node=1 --cpus-per-task=128 --job-name tau2-bench --account=nvr_lpr_agentic --gres=gpu:8  --container-image /lustre/fsw/portfolios/nvr/users/$USER/docker/s1.sqsh --container-save /lustre/fsw/portfolios/nvr/users/$USER/docker/s1.sqsh --container-mounts=$HOME:/home,/lustre:/lustre --pty /bin/bash

pip uninstall -y tau2
cd toolorches

genes.title: evaluation 文件结构
genes.content:
evaluation/.gitattributes
evaluation/eval_frames.py
evaluation/eval_hle.py
evaluation/eval_hle_basic.py
evaluation/examples.json
evaluation/frames.jsonl
evaluation/hle.jsonl
evaluation/retrieval_hle.py
evaluation/retrieval_wiki.py
evaluation/run_frames.py
evaluation/run_hle.py
evaluation/tau2-bench
evaluation/tau2-bench/.env.example
evaluation/tau2-bench/.python-version
evaluation/tau2-bench/.vscode

genes.title: evaluation 代码示例
genes.content:
srun --partition=interactive --time=04:00:00 --nodes=1 --overcommit --ntasks-per-node=1 --cpus-per-task=128 --job-name tau2-bench --account=nvr_lpr_agentic --gres=gpu:8  --container-image /lustre/fsw/portfolios/nvr/users/$USER/docker/s1.sqsh --container-save /lustre/fsw/portfolios/nvr/users/$USER/docker/s1.sqsh --container-mounts=$HOME:/home,/lustre:/lustre --pty /bin/bash

pip uninstall -y tau2
cd toolorchestra/evaluation/tau2-bench
pip install -e .
exit
